text: Kamaghɨn, nɨ Isipɨn kantrin aven, nguazir oteviba bar dar tongɨn, nguazir otevir bar aghuitam gɨnɨghnɨghɨva me mɨkemeghtɨ, me a dapiagh. Nɨ ifueghtɨ, me Gosenɨn Distrighɨn ikiam. Egh uaghan, nɨ men tongɨn, gumazir bulmakaubar ganamin fofozim iti tabagh fogh, egh ingangarim me danightɨ me nan bulmakaubar ganam.”
